how the fuck is 1280x544   720p ???

awesome, i was waiting a good quality release for a long time. 
   Thanx

@ Superarmy.

544 + black bars (because it isn't 16:9) = 720

Thus, 720p.

Media players automatically add the bars, there is no need for them to be included in the actual video.
